title: Apple Watch already accounts for 75 per cent of smartwatch market | Trusted Reviews
description: ![AppleWatch]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Apple has only officially admitted that the Apple Watch outsold the iPad intheir respective first 9 weeks on sale.The company isn’t revealing concrete sales figures for ‘competitive reasons,’but if it does turn out to have sold 4 million in the last three months, thenthat wouldn’t be a bad return at all, considering the early stock shortages.
